import React,{useState,useContext,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{AuthContext}from'../context/AuthContext';import{subscribeUser}from'../utils/subscribe';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const{login}=useContext(AuthContext);const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{// Clear cookies when the component mounts
